author: rich
msg: - http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-288 : Compiler: A jpf which has 2 forward annotations  with the same name on the same action, is NOT producing a warning or error
- http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-282 : Action annotation does not override the parent one when implimenting an abstract action from an abstract parent pageflow
- http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-227 : PageFlow Action loginRequired=false overriding loginRequired=true set in the Controller does not work when rolesAllowed is set in the Controller
- http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-193 : SharedFlow (.jpfs) files should not be web-addressable
- http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-267 : Patch for new a coreWeb MockPortal BVT
Also, merged the two areas of code related to request interceptors (o.a.b.netui.interceptor.request and o.a.b.netui.requeststate).

author: brett
msg: build reorganisation. Should be backwards compatible with previous goals.
